name: ESCAPE! (itch) (Aimas)
description:
Use the "Space" key to thrust upwards

Use the "A" key to thrust left

Use the "D" key to thrust right

Use the "Esc" key to exit fullscreen

Do not touch any red obstacles or the ground(brown)

Reach the landing pad to win the level

Go to https://aimas.itch.io/escape-downloadable to download this game
